title: Mausoleum of al-Salih Nagm al-Din and Sabil-Kuttab of Khussru Pasha
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Collector's note: 26 Salih Nagm ad-Din Ayoub (Mosq. et Tombe) Vue generale des monuments de Salih et Sabil Khosro Pacha. Translation of note: 26 Salih Nagm ad-Din Ayoub (Mosque & Tomb) General view of the monuments of Salih and fountain of Khosro Pacha.
topic: Mosques; Mausoleum; Ayyubud Architecture; Architecture, Ottoman
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
